hi.sts: जिसकी महिमा-स्तुति करने से हरि रत्न प्राप्त हो जाता है।

en.bdb: One is reconciled with the Lord, and shall not abandon Him again.
en.ms: The man leaves not the Lord again and is reconciled to Him.
en.ssk: One is reconciled with the Lord, and shall not abandon Him again.

hi.ss: (सिमरन की बरकति से) मनुष्य परमात्मा के साथ इतना रच-मिच जाता है कि (प्राप्त किए हुए उस नाम-रत्न को) दुबारा नहीं छोड़ता~

en.bdb: Meditating on Him, one hears the unstruck melody.
en.ms: By remembering whom, One hears the celestial strain.

hi.ss: मनुष्य एक-रस आत्मिक आनंद के गीत की धुनि सुनता रहता है (मनुष्य के अंदर हर वक्त आत्मिक आनंद की रौंअ चली रहती है)~

en.bdb: Meditating on Him, one acquires this pure reputation.
en.ms: By remembering whom, this mortal comes to have pure repute.
en.ssk: Meditating on Him, one acquires this pure reputation.

en.ms: They enjoy the incessant lauding of praises of the Lord as their food and dainty,
en.ssk: The unbroken Kirtan of the Lord's Praises is their food and nourishment.

es.sn: Oh, dice Nanak, Su alimento es la Melodía continua de la Alabanza,

hi.ss: उसने परमात्मा की एक-रस सिफत सालाह को अपनी आत्मा के लिए स्वादिष्ट भोजन बना लिया

en.ssk: Says Nanak, they have the Perfect True Guru. ||8||2||
